31  public function __construct($controllerName, $routePath, $views) {
32  $this->controllerName = $controllerName;
33  $this->routePath = $routePath;
34  $this->views = $views;
35  $this->controllerNS = Startup::getNS ( "controllers" );
36  }
37 
38  protected function addRoute(&$routePath) {
39  if (! UString::startswith ( $routePath, "/" )) {
40  $routePath = "/" . $routePath;
41  }
42  $routeName = $routePath;
43  $routePath = "\n * @route(\"{$routePath}\",\"inherited\"=>true,\"automated\"=>true)";
44  return $routeName;
45  }
